page.title: 05The Treborough Tip
page.content: {The old slate Quarry}at { Treborough has long ceased been worked as a Quarry but is now fulfilling a very different role in the life of the area. It is now used as the main {Municipal Refuse Tip of the West {Somerset District Council. }Although in many ways an ideal site it is not without its problems. The only access to this tip is through the narrow and winding{Roadwater Valley and the residents of this village are much{concerned by the heavy traffic. This is of course especially true in the height of the{holiday season when there is a lot of refuse from the holiday camps to be disposed of. With modern society producing such a lot of rubbish the local Council is now urgently engaged in seeking another site for a refuse tip.
